title: Mcp-Mysql-Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI models to interact with MySQL databases through a standardized interface.
creator: f4ww4z

MYSQL_HOST.description: The database host name or IP address.

MYSQL_USER.description: The username for authenticating to the MySQL database.

MYSQL_PASSWORD.description: The password for authenticating to the MySQL database.

MYSQL_DATABASE.description: The name of the MySQL database to connect to.
